DataElement.preferredDefinition: Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit.:The particular portion of space occupied by a physical object._One of the bodies in the cell nucleus that is the bearer of genes, has the form of a delicate chromatin filament during interphase, contracts to form a compact cylinder segmented into two arms by the centromere during metaphase and anaphase stages of cell division, and is capable of reproducing its physical and chemical structure through successive cell divisions._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit.:The particular portion of space occupied by a physical object._One of the bodies in the cell nucleus that is the bearer of genes, has the form of a delicate chromatin filament during interphase, contracts to form a compact cylinder segmented into two arms by the centromere during metaphase and anaphase stages of cell division, and is capable of reproducing its physical and chemical structure through successive cell divisions.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit.:The particular portion of space occupied by a physical object.

Concepts.definition: Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit.
Position; the particular portion of space occupied by a physical object.

Property.preferredDefinition: One of the bodies in the cell nucleus that is the bearer of genes, has the form of a delicate chromatin filament during interphase, contracts to form a compact cylinder segmented into two arms by the centromere during metaphase and anaphase stages of cell division, and is capable of reproducing its physical and chemical structure through successive cell divisions.

Concepts.definition: A structure found in cells that is comprised of a strand of linearized double-stranded DNA plus proteins that package the DNA in a condensed coil form and regulate chromosomal function.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 10/21/12 jc  Release caIntegrator v2.1 model content per model owner (Rashmi Srinivasa).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
